body: Here you go! ([http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&amp...;](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_daylight_simulation)) The file may take couple of minutes to run. You may want to lock solver before opening the file. If you have any specific question about this file I suggest to start a new discussion with a more related title.
